name: ARVA Energetika
overview:
ARVA Energetika is a Russian energy corporation headquartered in Geneva, Switzerland and active in more than 16 countries. It is engaged in every aspect of the oil, gas, and renewable energy industries, including exploration and production; refining, marketing and transport; chemicals manufacturing and sales; and power generation.

The company provides reservoir imaging, monitoring, and development services. The company offers 3D and time-lapse seismic surveys, electromagnetic surveys, and multicomponent surveys for delineating prospects and reservoir management. It also provides geophysical, land and transition-zone acquisition, marine acquisition, electromagnetics, and data processing and reservoir seismic services.

The company was formed by Sergei Kolobashkin and Maxim Chistyakov in 2010.
